description:
She is a bright and cheerful girl, and her clumsiness never ceases to amuse people. She lives with her father, who is a professional wedding photographer. She was told that her mother left when Momoko was only two...
Like her father, Momoko is also a photographer. She loves working on the school newspaper along with her two best friends, Yuri and Hinagiku, and especially enjoys reporting and taking pictures of the ever so popular soccer team of Saint Flower Garden School. It also helped that her two love interests are on that team: Yanagiba Kazuya, the star player and Fuuma Yousuke, the goalie.
name: Hanasaki Momoko
